comments.raw_text:
do you have "inline" view for attachments? (menu-->view-->display attachments inline)

Can you try unchecking menu-->view-->display attachments inline?

comments.text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> do you have "inline" view for attachments? (menu-->view-->display attachments inline)
yes, checked a "Display Attchments Inline".
mail.content_disposition_type = 1

however, vCard is not displayed in inline.
See attachment 526476.

Did you try this?
